alert.note: Alert for Daviess; Henderson (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 07 at 12:26PM EST until February 12 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Indiana...Kentucky...Illinois... Ohio River at Newburgh Dam Ohio River at Shawneetown ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... Kentucky... Ohio River at Mount Vernon .Recent precipitation has caused the Ohio River to rise. The river is forecast to reach flood stage at multiple locations early this week, and will remain above flood stage for the rest of the week. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING THROUGH FRIDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Ohio River at Newburgh Dam. * WHEN...Until early Saturday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM CST Monday the stage was 38.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 42.7 feet Wednesday evening. It will then fall below flood stage Friday evening. - Flood stage is 38.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
